original_text: One of the prophets went out into the fields to get some herbs to put in the soup. He found a wild plant and he picked some of its fruits. He filled the pockets of his coat with them. He brought the fruits back with him and he cut them into pieces. He put the pieces into the pot of soup. But he did not know what they were.
korean_text: 한 사람이 채소를 캐러 들에 나가 들포도덩굴을 만나 그것에서 들호박을 따서 옷자락에 채워가지고 돌아와 썰어 국 끓이는 솥에 넣되 그들은 무엇인지 알지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: One of the prophets went out
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자 중 한 사람이 밖으로 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and he picked some of its fruits
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 식물의 열매 중 일부를 따서

sentences.original_text: He filled the pockets of his coat with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들로 자신의 겉옷 주머니를 채웠습니다

sentences.original_text: He brought the fruits back with him
and he cut them into pieces
He put the pieces into the pot of soup
But he did not know what they were
